Guangyi Liu (刘广熠)

Email: guangyiliu AT link.cuhk.edu.cn
Office: 307, Research B Block

I am a Ph.D. student at the Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen, advised by Prof. Shuguang Cui and Prof. Zhen Li. I also collaborate closely with Prof. Zhiting Hu, Dr. Zichao Yang and Prof. Xiaodan Liang.

Before joining CUHK(SZ), I got my bachelor degree from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC) and ranked 1st/188 at School of Automation Engineering.

My research interests mainly lie in general areas in text generation.

Besides the academics, I am also interested in Powerlifting, and my personal records (KG/LB) are: Squat 180/396, Benching 112.5/248, and Deadlift 195/429 with the body weight 74.6/164, which are made in China Powerlifting Association (CPA) 2021 competition in Guangzhou (Video).

Google Scholar  /  Github /  Curriculum Vitae

News
  • August 2022: I'm going to visit Sailing Lab leaded by Prof. Eric Xing at Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI) in UAE.
  • August 2022: Our preprinted paper Composable Text Control Operations in Latent Space with Ordinary Differential Equations has been released on arXiv.
  • May 2022: Our paper Don't Take It Literally: An Edit-Invariant Sequence Loss for Text Generation has been accepted by NAACL 2022 as an oral presentation.
  • July 2021: Our paper Medical-VLBERT: Medical Visual Language BERT for COVID-19 CT Report Generation with Alternate Learning has been accepted by TNNLS 2021.
  • October 2020: Our paper Learning to Decouple Relations: Few-Shot Relation Classification with Entity-Guided Attention and Confusion-Aware Training has been accepted by COLING 2020.
